idea-plugin.name: MyBatis plugin
idea-plugin.description:
Simple mybatis plugin for self usage
Based on mapper scan and type alias
Anyway, sorry for bad english

Features

  • Auto add @Param annotation for method and parameter(Action under idea "Tools" menu)
  • Auto completion for extends of resutlMap in mapper.xml
  • Auto completion for include tag in mapper.xml
  • Quick document with statement for mapper method(keystroke F1)
  • Parameter auto completion in mapper.xml (based on @Param with parameters of mapper method)
  • Parameter auto completion of test condition in mapper.xml
  • Parameter auto completion of #{parameter} in mapper.xml
  • Result map auto completion in mapper.xml
  • Result map and result type reference
  • Add line marker for java mapper and statement in xml
  • Auto to generate statement from mapper method
  • Type alias completion for resultType in mapper.xml
  • Navigation from statement to method of java mapper
  • Navigation from method of java mapper to statement

Generate new statement

  • Focus on a mapper method, then idea "Tools" -> "Generate Statement"
  • It will do nothing if the method has be annotated with mybatis annotation, such as @Select, @Update, ...
  • It will do nothing if the method has already referenced to a statement
  • The pattern of method name for generating statment is configurable with idea "Preference" -> "Mybatis"
